original_text: And did eat and drink before the Lord on that day with great gladness. And they made Solomon the son of David king the second time, and anointed him unto the Lord to be the chief governor, and Zadok to be priest.
korean_text: 이 날에 무리가 크게 기뻐하여 여호와 앞에서 먹으며 마셨더라

sentences.original_text: And did eat and drink before the Lord
on that day with great gladness
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날에 큰 기쁨으로 함께 했고

sentences.original_text: And they made Solomon the son of David
and anointed him unto the Lord
